name: Local Square Loses His Pottasium
description:
Game Description

In this game you play as a square that loses his gravity-changing bananas, gets kidnapped by the FBI, and sent to a containment facility in Area-51, you must escape by platforming through levels with some puzzle aspects. Additionally, the game includes a speedrun mode with an online leaderboard included too.

Game Controls

WASD To move
Jump with W or Space
Change Gravity with your mouse (Didnt have time to get arrow keys working)
Interact with E

Features
  • Online Leaderboard
  • Speedrunning Mode
  • Volume Setting
  • Gravity Changing bananas! (Best feature ever)
  • Cutscenes
  • Levels
  • Lots of fun
  • Several SoundTracks
Special Thanks To
  • Datwe for making awesome audio and music.
  • Dany10 for helping out with Ideas
  • My sister Geo (Thats what we call her am not even joking) for helping out with playtesting
  • Everyone on the Icoso Discord Server (Geo Jam Channels) for helping out with feedback and being overall supportive
